en.title: 9 Y.O. Sensation Sings for FE's "Hope For Children"!
en.content:
FE is proud to present 9 year old child singing sensation, Clark Gamul, from the Philippines who touched the hearts of of an audience of 1,800 at the launch of FE's "Hope For Children" Charity at PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, 08th August 2009  with his beautiful renditions of Michael Jackson's songs "Ben",  I'll Be There" and "We Are The World". Clark also sang the theme song "Hope For Children" written specially for the launch. We can see tears flowing in the audience. FE is so proud of you, Clark! You are a Star !

Clark is a product of the Philippines Center For Arts Foundation, an NGO set up to train and nurture young and gifted children from poor families ( Clark's father drives a trishaw in Manila, earning USD 5 a day ) to excel in the performing arts and to provide them with a brighter future.

"Hope For Children" will be working closely with the Philippines Center For Arts Foundation to raise funds to help more gifted children from poor families from around the world to achieve their dreams, like Clark.
WATCH VIDEO BEN WATCH VIDEO I’LL BE THERE
WATCH VIDEO WE ARE THE WORLD

WATCH VIDEO HOPE FOR CHILDREN
LYRICS FOR THEME SONG "HOPE FOR CHILDREN":

Lyrics by: Jerome Vinarao and Bill Velasco 
Music by: Noel Zarate 
Performed by: Clark James B. Gamul 
  
I NEVER LIKE THE LIGHT OF DAY 
SHAME WAS ALL I SEEM TO KNOW 
PEOPLE HURT ME IN THE WORST WAYS 
I HAVE NOWHERE ELSE TO GO 
  
I WAS ALONE LOST AND CAST A STRAY 
BOUND AND BROKEN AND STRUCK LOW 
THEY SAID THEY'D LOVE ME AND SHOW ME THE WAY 
INSTEAD THEY BROKE ME AND SOLD MY SOUL 
  
DO I HAVE A FUTURE IN THIS WORLD 
GIVE ME BACK THE HOPE THEY STOLE AWAY 
MAKE ME READY MAKE ME STRONG 
LET ME WALK IN THE LIGHT AGAIN 
I AM THE FUTURE OF THE WORLD 
  
NOW ALL MY HURT HAS GONE AWAY 
YOU WERE THERE TO EASE ALL MY PAIN 
TEARS THAT FELL IN THE DARK ARE WASHED AWAY 
THE WORLD IS BRIGHT AND SAFE AGAIN 
  
I AM THE FUTURE OF THE WORLD 
I’VE TAKEN BACK THE HOPE THEY STOLE AWAY 
NOW I’M READY NOW I’M STRONG I CAN WALK IN THE LIGHT AGAIN 
THEY CAN’T HURT ME ANYMORE 
  
I AM THE FUTURE OF THE WORLD 
I’VE TAKEN BACK THE HOPE THEY STOLE AWAY 
I AM READY I AM STRONG I CAN WALK IN THE LIGHT AGAIN 
I AM THE FUTURE OF THE WORLD 
  
I CAN WALK IN THE LIGHT AGAIN
